alert.note: Alert for Florence; Lincoln; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:47PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A broken line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Forest, Lincoln, Vilas, Florence, northern Marinette, Oneida, northern Oconto and Langlade Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 346 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rainbow Flowage to 6 miles east of Willow Reservoir to near Spirit. These storms will be capable of producing brief gusty winds and isolated areas of small hail. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rainbow Flowage around 350 PM CDT. Eagle River, Newbold and Woodboro around 400 PM CDT. Rhinelander around 405 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Crystal Lake Scout Reservation, Tomahawk, Gilbert, Headwaters Wilderness, Harrison and Parrish. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
